audioText: L'architecte professionnel examine minutieusement chaque boulon avec sa scie électrique pour établir un compromis technique concernant l'aspiration des débris dans cette tour moderne.
question: How does the professional architect examine each bolt for the technical compromise?
options: Meticulously with his electric saw to establish compromise regarding debris suction in the modern tower
Quickly with standard tools to meet construction deadlines
Carefully with manual equipment to ensure safety standards
Thoroughly with measuring devices to verify specifications
explanation: The text states 'L'architecte professionnel examine minutieusement chaque boulon avec sa scie électrique pour établir un compromis technique concernant l'aspiration des débris dans cette tour moderne.' - 'The professional architect meticulously examines each bolt with his electric saw to establish a technical compromise regarding debris suction in this modern tower.' The nouns 'boulon' means bolt, 'scie' means saw, and 'aspirateur' (aspiration) refers to vacuum/suction.
